| History                 = The Special Threat Assessment for Known Extranormalities (a.k.a. S.T.A.K.E.) was a [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] project inspired by [[Timothy Dugan (Earth-616)|Dum Dum Dugan]]'s [[Howling Commandos (S.H.I.E.L.D.) (Earth-616)|Howling Commandos]], which focused on dealing with supernatural occurrences.{{r|S.H.I.E.L.D. Vol 3 9}}

At the time when [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] took over S.H.I.E.L.D. and most of the United States, the Howling Commandos alongside S.T.A.K.E. fell under Hydra's control.{{r|Secret Warriors Vol 2 2}}
